string.value: So, you're a federal agent sent to do the job that our task force apparently failed to accomplish? Well, we'll see.
Before I tell you the gist of the mission, I want you to get comfortable with the vehicle you'll be driving for many miles.
I know you are an excellent driver, but every vehicle has its own features that are best learned in the relatively calm environment of the base's surroundings.
Get comfortable with the controls, feel the grip, try the brakes. Learn how to use the equipment for taking environmental samples.
You should like the vehicle. Firstly, because you won't get another one anyway.
Secondly, because the vehicle is truly a beast. Even your famous Bureau doesn't have anything like it.
You only need to get used to the vehicle. By the way, keep in mind that the surrounding area is not completely safe.
A number of armed bastards, stubbornly ignoring the governmental emergency order, continue to roam the area.
They will not miss the opportunity to empty their clips at you. I recommend not giving them a chance and shooting first.
Well, what do you think? Have you ever driven a vehicle like this before? I'm sure you haven't.
As soon as any catastrophe, even the tiniest one, happens, all the worst in people awakens.
The evacuation work had barely begun when hordes of looters crawled out of every crack. They are taking away the stolen possessions in whole truckloads.
One of such convoys will soon be passing by your location. Do you understand me?
That's right, this is a great opportunity to test your new vehicle's weapons on them. Don't let the robbers get away.
Agent, the local sheriff's department has refused to comply with our directive to cooperate. It seems the sheriff has gone completely nuts and thinks he's the local kingpin.
Keep in mind that if local police interfere with your mission, you have the right to deal with them under the orders of the state of emergency - that is, extremely aggressively.
You have a steady hand and a keen eye, agent.
So, I guess the preparation is complete.
You've familiarized yourself with the vehicle, the weaponry, the terrain, and the general state of affairs. It's time to move on to the main mission.
Yes, now I am ready to believe that you really can go where a whole squad of my best guys perished.
The world has certainly become cleaner.
As I told you earlier, there are a number of antisocial individuals in this area who engage in robbery and looting.
A decision was made to stop such activity, by any, and I repeat, absolutely any means necessary. Do you understand me, agent?
Just now, with the help of a reconnaissance helicopter, we have detected one of the marauder camps. You are tasked with eliminating these bandits.
It can't be! These soldiers left their post without permission?!
What could be more disgusting than desertion! Mutants, zombies and other abominations are no excuse.
If a soldier in the American army has to fear anyone, it should be his sergeant, not some brainless zombie!
Frankly, I don't understand where do so many armed trespassers come from in such a tightly cordoned off area? How do they get here?
This needs to be found out, and the sooner the better.

И так, вы агент федерального бюро, присланный сделать то, с чем, похоже, не справилась армейская разведка? Ну что ж посмотрим. Прежде чем сообщить вам суть задания, я хочу, чтобы вы освоились с автомобилем, на котором вам придется преодолеть немало миль.

Я знаю, что вы отличный водитель, но у каждого автомобиля есть свои особенности, с которыми лучше познакомиться в относительно спокойной обстановке окрестностей базы. Освойтесь с управлением, почувствуйте, сцепление, тормоз. Освойте механизмы взятия проб внешней среды.

Don't forget, the car is equipped with an automatic navigator - that fancy device on the left panel. The guys programmed your mission route into this thing, so it will always tell you where to turn the wheel.

It seems that not only people but also nature have gone crazy here. Wandering tornadoes have been spotted in places in the region - avoid them unless you've always felt like trying out the hellish carousel.
There is a settlement inhabited by the civilian personnel of the base up ahead. According to intelligence, an unknown gang has set up a checkpoint there. Drive the bastards away!

Итак, вы агент федерального бюро, присланный сделать то, с чем, похоже, не справилась армейская разведка? Ну что ж посмотрим. Прежде чем сообщить вам суть задания, я хочу, чтобы вы освоились с автомобилем, на котором вам придется преодолеть немало миль. Я знаю, что вы отличный водитель, но у каждого автомобиля есть свои особенности, с которыми лучше познакомиться в относительно спокойной обстановке окрестностей базы. Освойтесь с управлением, почувствуйте, сцепление, тормоз. Освойте механизмы взятия проб внешней среды.| Дополнительное условие:| Взять пробы грунта и воздуха (не менее 100)
Итак, полагаю, что подготовка завершена. Вы ознакомились с машиной, оружием, местностью, а так же с общим положением дел. Настало время перейти к основному заданию.

@ffef8d00“Repair” pickup| | |@ffccccccThis bonus restores @ffab1e1e75 points of structural integrity@ffcccccc of the vehicle.| |Currently, the maximum structural intergrity value of your vehicle is @ffab1e1e300@ffcccccc. By upgrading the armor in the garage you can increase this value to @ffab1e1e450@ffcccccc and @ffab1e1e600@ffcccccc at the second and third level of the upgrade respectively.

@ffef8d00“Armor” pickup| | |@ffccccccThis bonus restores @ffab1e1e75 points of armor@ffcccccc. Armor reduces all received damage, so the more armor you have, the more protected your vehicle is.| |Currently, the maximum armor value of your vehicle is @ffab1e1e150@ffcccccc. By upgrading the armor in the garage you can increase this value to @ffab1e1e225@ffcccccc and @ffab1e1e300@ffcccccc at the second and third level of the upgrade respectively.
@ffef8d00“Damage” pickup| | |@ffccccccThis bonus increases all damage you deal by @ffab1e1e4 times@ffcccccc.| |Effect duration - @ffab1e1e30 seconds@ffcccccc.

@ffef8d00“Refill” pickup| | |@ffccccccThis bonus replenishes your @ffab1e1eTurbo@ffcccccc and @ffab1e1eJumper@ffcccccc charges.| |Turbo is activated by pressing the @ffab1e1eAlt@ffcccccc key and has a duration of @ffab1e1e55 seconds@ffcccccc of continuous use at the first level of the upgrade.| |Jumper is activated by the @ffab1e1eSpace@ffcccccc key. First level of the Jumper provides you with just @ffab1e1e11@ffcccccc charges to go around.

@ffef8d00“Auxiliary weapon” pickup| | |@ffccccccThis bonus temporarily places an auxiliary weapon in additional weapon slot.| |Firing of auxiliary weapons is done by holding the @ffab1e1eRight mouse button@ffcccccc. Effect duration - @ffab1e1e45 seconds@ffcccccc.

@ffef8d00“Virus probe” item| | |@ffccccccYou receive an additional reward for picking up this item. Information about the amount of probes like thse per level can be found in the briefings before missions.| |The maximum reward can be up to @ffab1e1e2,000 reward points@ffcccccc.

@ffef8d00“Info” item| | |@ffccccccYou receive an additional reward for picking up this item. There is at least 1 disk hidden on each level.| |The total reward for finding this item is @ffab1e1e4500 reward points@ffcccccc.

@ffccccccWelcome to the @ffab1e1eNew game@ffef8d00+@ffcccccc mode. The new rules are as follows:| |- More dangerous enemies (more powerful weaponry, more agressive behaviour, faster rocket launchers aiming);|- Speedrunners are not welcome here: to successfuly complete the mission you have to pass through all the checkpoints;|- “Damage” and “Refill” pickups are no longer available.
@ffab1e1eYou CAN'T change the current reality and the territory KICK you out!| |@ffccccccYou haven't passed through all the checkpoints. On this note the thread of prophecy is severed.
